comments.body: Looks like your username is `mgdodge` and not `innovation-team`?
Work happened on company hours, so it is part of their repo.

Just a suggestion, you can also improved the typings by providing the string literal. i.e:
```js
type OktaOpenIdScopesType = 'openid' | 'email' | 'profile' | 'address' | 'phone' | 'groups' | 'offline_access';
...
scopes?: OktaOpenIdScopesType[],
....
```
